metadata.Description: A strategy developed by a country to guide its digital transformation and promote the use of digital technologies.

national digital strategy.Description: The national digital strategy implements data governance frameworks to ensure the effective management and protection of data.
The national digital strategy provides funding for the implementation and maintenance of data governance frameworks.
The national digital strategy focuses on the development and enhancement of data governance frameworks to ensure data integrity and privacy.
The national digital strategy is embedded in the implementation and enforcement of data governance frameworks.
The national digital strategy collaborates and partners with data governance frameworks to ensure effective data management and governance.
The national digital strategy contributes to the development and improvement of data governance frameworks to enhance data security and privacy.
The national digital strategy monitors the implementation and compliance of data governance frameworks to ensure adherence to data management standards.
The national digital strategy sets targets and goals for the implementation and effectiveness of data governance frameworks.
The national digital strategy addresses the challenges and issues related to data governance frameworks to ensure their successful implementation and operation.
